summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MapMoments social media app with geolocation and visual storytelling features. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate with all authentication, pin management, friend system, and discovery features working perfectly. Frontend shows excellent glassmorphism design implementation with successful navigation and integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal backdrop overlay prevents Create Pin button from being clicked easily

passed_tests: Main map view with Mapbox integration
Navigation between Map, Profile, Discover pages
Profile page with user stats and friend management
Friend system: search users, send friend requests
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix pin creation modal overlay issue - the modal backdrop is intercepting clicks on the Create Pin button. Consider adding force=true to click handler or adjusting z-index/pointer-events CSS.
